long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of having to put up with terrible UI or having to find your school's FlexiSched instance? Well look no further! Try out FlexiSched++. FlexiSched++ allows you to manage your FlexiSched scheduling needs all from one chrome extension! No more needing to navigate through the confusing wording of FlexiSched or fussing over FlexiSched authentication! With this extension, all of this will be automatically handled for you, bundled in a user-friendly, modern interface for convenience!
